page.title: 14MEDIA
page.content: In England there are four major television channels.They are BBC1,BBC2,ITV and Channel 4.The most popular type of programme on television at the moment is Soap Opera A soap opera is a story which closely follows the day life of a family or neighbourhood.Imported American "Soaps" like "Dallas" are very popular in this country.They tend to be about powerful and glamorous people. There are also English soap operas,for instance, "Coronation Street",which are much more about down to earth life.Quiz shows are also very popular, like "Connections" and "The Price is Right".These give away prizes like cars, caravans and the "holiday of a lifetime".There are also documentaries shown on televison such as "The Real World" and "World in Action".
